verses.verse: Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H376>any<s%> of us <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> unto <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430%H1008>God<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> there till <S%H6153>even<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voices<s%>, and <S%H1058%H1065>wept<s%> <S%H1419>sore<s%>;

And <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, why is this come to pass in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that there should be to <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H6485>lacking<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is there among all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> not up with the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? For they had made a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> concerning him that came not <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them for <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> their <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, There is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> cut <S%H1438>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

How shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain<s%>, seeing we have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that we will not <S%H5414>give<s%> them of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H802>wives<s%>?

¶ And they <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H259>one<s%> is there of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that came not <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? And, behold, there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H376>none<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from <S%H3003%H1568>Jabesh-gilead<s%> to the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.
For the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, and, behold, there were <S%H376>none<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003%H1568>Jabesh-gilead<s%> there.

And the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> thither <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H1121%H2428>valiantest<s%>, and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003%H1568>Jabesh-gilead<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, with the <S%H802>women<s%> and the <S%H2945>children<s%>.

And this is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%>, Ye shall utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%>, and every <S%H802>woman<s%> that hath <S%H4904>lain<s%> by <S%H3045>man<s%>.

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003%H1568>Jabesh-gilead<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%>, that had <S%H3045>known<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with any <S%H2145>male<s%>: and they <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> some to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> that were in the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>, and to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> unto them.

And <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>; and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> which they had saved <S%H2421>alive<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H3003%H1568>Jabesh-gilead<s%>: and yet so they <S%H4672>sufficed<s%> them not.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> them for <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, because that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H6556>breach<s%> in the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, How shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> for <S%H802>wives<s%> for them that <S%H3498>remain<s%>, seeing the <S%H802>women<s%> are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, There must be an <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> for them that be <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, that a <S%H7626>tribe<s%> be not <S%H4229>destroyed<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Howbeit we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

Then they <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, there is a <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H3117%H3117>yearly<s%> in a place which is on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, on the east <S%H4217%H8121>side<s%> of the <S%H4546>highway<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3829>Lebonah<s%>.
Therefore they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>;

And <S%H7200>see<s%>, and, behold, if the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H2342>dance<s%> in <S%H4246>dances<s%>, then come ye <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H2414>catch<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And it shall be, when their <S%H1>fathers<s%> or their <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto us to <S%H7378>complain<s%>, that we will <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Be <S%H2603>favourable<s%> unto them for our sakes: because we <S%H3947>reserved<s%> not to each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4421>war<s%>: for ye did not <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them at this <S%H6256>time<s%>, that ye should be <S%H816>guilty<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%>, according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>, of them that <S%H2342>danced<s%>, whom they <S%H1497>caught<s%>: and they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and <S%H1129>repaired<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in them.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> thence at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7626>tribe<s%> and to his <S%H4940>family<s%>, and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> from thence every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.
In those <S%H3117>days<s%> there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
